test_cases.title: Successful login using valid username
test_cases.preconditions: User has a registered account with a valid username
steps: Enter valid username into the username field
Enter valid password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Successful login using valid email address
test_cases.preconditions: User has a registered account with a valid email address
steps: Enter valid email address into the username field
Enter valid password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Login failure with unregistered credentials
steps: Enter an unregistered username into the username field
Enter any password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed and the input fields remain populated with the entered values

test_cases.title: Login failure with incorrect password
steps: Enter a valid registered username into the username field
Enter an incorrect password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed and the input fields remain populated with the entered values

test_cases.title: Retry login after authentication error
steps: Enter an incorrect password into the password field
Click the Log In button
Clear the password field
Enter the correct password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is successfully redirected to the account dashboard after the second attempt

test_cases.title: Login attempt with empty fields
steps: Leave username and password fields empty
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that credentials are required

test_cases.title: Login with special characters in username
test_cases.preconditions: User has a registered account containing special characters in the username
steps: Enter username containing special characters (e.g., user!@#) into the username field
Enter valid password into the password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Successful customer lookup with valid details
test_cases.preconditions: A registered customer record exists in the system
steps: Enter a valid First Name into the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name into the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address into the Address field
Enter a valid City into the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code into the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN into the SSN field
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays the appropriate recovery details for the matching record

test_cases.title: Error message displayed when no matching record is found
test_cases.preconditions: No customer record exists with the provided details
steps: Enter non-existent First Name into the First Name field
Enter non-existent Last Name into the Last Name field
Enter non-existent Address into the Address field
Enter non-existent City into the City field
Select any State from the State dropdown
Enter a non-existent Zip Code into the Zip Code field
Enter a non-existent SSN into the SSN field
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays an error message indicating no matching record was found

test_cases.title: Validation error when First Name is left blank
steps: Leave the First Name field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: A prompt appears requesting the user to complete the First Name field

test_cases.title: Validation error when Last Name is left blank
steps: Leave the Last Name field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: A prompt appears requesting the user to complete the Last Name field

test_cases.title: Validation error when Address is left blank
steps: Leave the Address field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: A prompt appears requesting the user to complete the Address field

test_cases.title: Validation error when City is left blank
steps: Leave the City field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: A prompt appears requesting the user to complete the City field

test_cases.title: Validation error when Zip Code is left blank
steps: Leave the Zip Code field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: A prompt appears requesting the user to complete the Zip Code field

test_cases.title: Validation error when SSN is left blank
steps: Leave the SSN field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: A prompt appears requesting the user to complete the SSN field

test_cases.title: Customer lookup with special characters in name fields
test_cases.preconditions: A record exists with special characters in the name (e.g., O'Connor)
steps: Enter 'O'Connor' into the Last Name field
Fill all other fields with matching valid data
Click the Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: The page successfully finds and displays the recovery details for the record

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
test_cases.preconditions: User has an existing account with a valid username and password
steps: Enter a valid username into the Username field
Enter the corresponding valid password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is successfully authenticated and granted access to their account

test_cases.title: Successful account registration with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded and the user is not logged in
steps: Enter 'John' into the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' into the Last Name field
Enter '123 Maple Street' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'Illinois' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '555-0199' into the Phone # field
Enter '999-00-1111' into the SSN field
Enter 'johndoe_unique' into the Username field
Enter 'Password123!' into the Password field
Enter 'Password123!' into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is created and the user is automatically redirected to the logged-in state/dashboard

test_cases.title: Login failure with empty username
steps: Leave the Username field empty
Enter a valid password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents login and displays a validation error indicating the username is mandatory

test_cases.title: Login failure with empty password
steps: Enter a valid username into the Username field
Leave the Password field empty
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents login and displays a validation error indicating the password is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when First Name is empty
steps: Leave the First Name field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating First Name is mandatory and no account is created

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Last Name is empty
steps: Leave the Last Name field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating Last Name is mandatory and no account is created

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Username is empty
steps: Leave the Username field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating Username is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Password is empty
steps: Leave the Password field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating Password is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Confirm Password is empty
steps: Leave the Confirm Password field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating Confirm Password is mandatory

test_cases.title: Verify navigation to Forgot Login Info page
steps: Click the 'Forgot login info?' link
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the password recovery or account assistance page

test_cases.title: Verify navigation to Register page
steps: Click the 'Register' link
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account registration page

test_cases.title: Login failure with both fields empty
steps: Leave the Username field empty
Leave the Password field empty
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents login and displays validation errors for both mandatory fields

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Address is empty
steps: Leave the Address field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating Address is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when City is empty
steps: Leave the City field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating City is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when State is empty
steps: Leave the State field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating State is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Zip Code is empty
steps: Leave the Zip Code field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating Zip Code is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Phone # is empty
steps: Leave the Phone # field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating Phone # is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration fails when SSN is empty
steps: Leave the SSN field empty
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating SSN is mandatory

test_cases.title: Login with special characters in username and password
test_cases.preconditions: An account exists where the username and password contain special characters (e.g., !@#$%^&*)
steps: Enter the username containing special characters into the Username field
Enter the password containing special characters into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is successfully authenticated and granted access to their account

test_cases.title: Registration with special characters in name and address fields
steps: Enter 'O'Connor-Smith' into the Last Name field
Enter 'Apt #4, 1/2 St.' into the Address field
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system successfully creates the account and logs the user in

test_cases.title: Registration with very long strings in mandatory fields
steps: Enter a 100-character string into the First Name field
Enter a 100-character string into the Username field
Fill all other mandatory fields with valid data
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The system successfully creates the account and logs the user in

test_cases.title: Open New Savings Account with valid funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page and has at least one existing account with a balance of $100.00 or more
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new savings account is created with a unique account number and a $100.00 credit, while the source account is debited $100.00

test_cases.title: Open New Checking Account with valid funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page and has at least one existing account with a balance of $100.00 or more
steps: Select 'Checking' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new checking account is created with a unique account number and a $100.00 credit, while the source account is debited $100.00

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account with insufficient funds in source account
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page and selects a source account with a balance less than $100.00
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select the account with insufficient funds from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays an error message stating that the required opening deposit of $100.00 is not available in the selected source account

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account without selecting an account type
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Leave the account type dropdown unselected
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating that an account type must be selected

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account without selecting a funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Leave the funding source dropdown unselected
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error indicating that a funding source must be selected

test_cases.title: Verify unique account number generation for consecutive requests
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page and has sufficient funds for multiple accounts
steps: Open a Savings account using a valid funding source
Return to the Open New Account page
Open a second Savings account using the same funding source
test_cases.expected_result: Two different unique account numbers are generated for the two new accounts
